ValidationRule.description: We created this validation rule in response to users entering a purchase price for Installation & PPSA products on Oppty Product, because of an error downstream when Order Products are created during site survey approval.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Product2.Item_Type__c='Service', NOT(ISBLANK( Purchase_Price__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(Product2.Name, 'PPSA')), NOT(CONTAINS(Product2.Name, 'Delivery')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Purchase price is not allowed for this product.
